languages.text: "Я никогда..." {n}Сдавленный вздох. Смешок.{/n} "Никогда в жизни не видела такой высоты. На корабле нет таких расстояний. Мне кажется, эта пустота сейчас проглотит меня..." {n}Кибелла поворачивается к вам — ее лицо озаряет искренняя улыбка.{/n} "...и это восхитительно".

traits.locale_text: "Я никогда..." {n}Сдавленный вздох. Смешок.{/n} "Я никогда в жизни не видела такой высоты. На пустотном корабле нет таких расстояний. Мне кажется, эта пустота сейчас проглотит меня..." {n}Кибелла поворачивается к вам — ее лицо озаряет искренняя улыбка.{/n} "...и это восхитительно".

languages.text: "I've never..." {n}Another stifled gasp. Then a laugh.{/n} "I have never seen such heights before in my life. No distance on the ship comes close to this. I feel like this emptiness might swallow me whole..." {n}Kibellah turns to you and smiles, this time sincerely.{/n} "It's beautiful."
languages.original_text: "Я никогда..." {n}Сдавленный вздох. Смешок.{/n} "Никогда в жизни не видела такой высоты. На корабле нет таких расстояний. Мне кажется, эта пустота сейчас проглотит меня..." {n}Кибелла поворачивается к вам — ее лицо озаряет искренняя улыбка.{/n} "...и это восхитительно".

traits.locale_text: "I've never..." {n}Another stifled gasp. Then a laugh.{/n} "I've never seen such heights before in my life. No distance on the ship comes close to this. I feel as if this emptiness might swallow me whole..." {n}Kibellah turns to you and smiles, this time sincerely.{/n} "...and it's beautiful."

"I've never..." {n}Another stifled gasp. Then a laugh.{/n} "I've never seen such heights before in my life. No distance on the ship comes close to this. I feel as if this emptiness might swallow me whole..." {n}Kibellah turns to you and smiles, this time sincerely.{/n} "...and it's beautiful."

"I've never..." {n}Another stifled gasp. Then a laugh.{/n} "I have never seen such heights before in my life. No distance on the ship comes close to this. I feel like this emptiness might swallow me whole..." {n}Kibellah turns to you and smiles, this time sincerely.{/n} "It's beautiful."

"I've never..." {n}Another stifled gasp. Then a laugh.{/n} "I have never seen such heights before in my life. No distance on the ship comes close to this. I feel like this emptiness might swallow me whole..." {n}Kibellah turns to you and smiles, this time sincerely.{/n} "It's beautiful."

"I've never..." {n}Another stifled gasp. Then a laugh.{/n} "I have never seen such heights before in my life. No distance on the ship comes close to this. I feel like this emptiness might swallow me whole..." {n}Kibellah turns to you and smiles, this time sincerely.{/n} "It's beautiful."

languages.text: "Ich habe noch nie ..." {n}Erneut keucht sie auf, unterdrückt es. Dann lacht sie.{/n} "Ich habe noch nie eine derartige Höhe gesehen. Auf dem gesamten Schiff gibt es keine auch nur annähernd so große Distanz. Ich fühle mich, als könnte diese Leere mich verschlucken ..." {n}Kibellah wendet sich zu dir und lächelt, dieses Mal aufrichtig.{/n} "Es ist wunderschön."
languages.original_text: "I've never..." {n}Another stifled gasp. Then a laugh.{/n} "I have never seen such heights before in my life. No distance on the ship comes close to this. I feel like this emptiness might swallow me whole..." {n}Kibellah turns to you and smiles, this time sincerely.{/n} "It's beautiful."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe noch nie ..." {n}Erneut keucht sie auf, unterdrückt es. Dann lacht sie.{/n} "Ich habe noch nie eine derartige Höhe gesehen. Auf dem gesamten Schiff gibt es keine auch nur annähernd so große Distanz. Ich fühle mich, als könnte diese Leere mich verschlucken ..." {n}Kibellah wendet sich zu dir und lächelt, dieses Mal aufrichtig.{/n} "Es ist wunderschön."

languages.text: «Nunca...». {n}Otro jadeo ahogado. Después, una risa.{/n} «Nunca antes había visto unas alturas como estas. Ninguna distancia de la nave se acerca a esto. Es como si este vacío pudiera devorarme...». {n}Kibellah se gira hacia ti y sonríe, esta vez con sinceridad.{/n} «Es precioso».
languages.original_text: "I've never..." {n}Another stifled gasp. Then a laugh.{/n} "I have never seen such heights before in my life. No distance on the ship comes close to this. I feel like this emptiness might swallow me whole..." {n}Kibellah turns to you and smiles, this time sincerely.{/n} "It's beautiful."

traits.locale_text: «Nunca...». {n}Otro jadeo ahogado. Después, una risa.{/n} «Nunca antes había visto unas alturas como estas. Ninguna distancia de la nave se acerca a esto. Es como si este vacío pudiera devorarme...». {n}Kibellah se gira hacia ti y sonríe, esta vez con sinceridad.{/n} «Es precioso».

languages.text: 「私はこれまで…」{n}また息をのむ音がする。そして笑い声が。{/n}「私はこれまでの人生で、こんな高さを見たことはなかったわ。船上のどんな距離もこれには及ばない。このぽっかりと空いた空間に飲み込まれてしまいそう…」{n}キベラは、あなたに振り返ってほほ笑む。今回は親しみを込めて。{/n}「美しいわ」
languages.original_text: "I've never..." {n}Another stifled gasp. Then a laugh.{/n} "I have never seen such heights before in my life. No distance on the ship comes close to this. I feel like this emptiness might swallow me whole..." {n}Kibellah turns to you and smiles, this time sincerely.{/n} "It's beautiful."

traits.locale_text: 「私はこれまで…」{n}また息をのむ音がする。そして笑い声が。{/n}「私はこれまでの人生で、こんな高さを見たことはなかったわ。船上のどんな距離もこれには及ばない。このぽっかりと空いた空間に飲み込まれてしまいそう…」{n}キベラは、あなたに振り返ってほほ笑む。今回は親しみを込めて。{/n}「美しいわ」

languages.text: “我从来……”{n}绮贝菈再次发出了窒息般的喘气，随后大笑起来。{/n}“我这辈子从来没到过这么高的地方，船上的风景和这里简直没法比。我感觉广阔的虚空仿佛要把我整个吞掉一样……”{n}绮贝菈转向你，笑了起来，这次露出的是真诚的笑容。{/n}“好美。”
languages.original_text: "I've never..." {n}Another stifled gasp. Then a laugh.{/n} "I have never seen such heights before in my life. No distance on the ship comes close to this. I feel like this emptiness might swallow me whole..." {n}Kibellah turns to you and smiles, this time sincerely.{/n} "It's beautiful."

traits.locale_text: “我从来……”{n}绮贝菈再次发出了窒息般的喘气，随后大笑起来。{/n}“我这辈子从来没到过这么高的地方，船上的风景和这里简直没法比。我感觉广阔的虚空仿佛要把我整个吞掉一样……”{n}绮贝菈转向你，笑了起来，这次露出的是真诚的笑容。{/n}“好美。”

languages.text: « Je n'ai jamais... » {n}Un autre hoquet étouffé, puis un rire.{/n} « C'est la première fois que je me trouve à une telle hauteur. Il n'y a rien de comparable à bord du vaisseau. J'ai l'impression que ce précipice pourrait m'engloutir tout entière... » {n}Kibellah se tourne vers vous avec un sourire sincère.{/n} « C'est magnifique. »
languages.original_text: "I've never..." {n}Another stifled gasp. Then a laugh.{/n} "I have never seen such heights before in my life. No distance on the ship comes close to this. I feel like this emptiness might swallow me whole..." {n}Kibellah turns to you and smiles, this time sincerely.{/n} "It's beautiful."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'ai jamais... » {n}Un autre hoquet étouffé, puis un rire.{/n} « C'est la première fois que je me trouve à une telle hauteur. Il n'y a rien de comparable à bord du vaisseau. J'ai l'impression que ce précipice pourrait m'engloutir tout entière... » {n}Kibellah se tourne vers vous avec un sourire sincère.{/n} « C'est magnifique. »

languages.text: "Ben hayatımda..." {n}Boğuk bir nefes daha duyuluyor. Ardından bir kahkaha geliyor.{/n} "Ben hayatımda böylesine yükseklikleri hiç görmemiştim. Gemide katedilen hiçbir mesafe, bunun yanına yaklaşamaz. Boşluk beni bütün olarak yutacakmış hissine kapılıyorum..." {n}Kibellah sana dönerek artık içten bir şekilde gülümsüyor.{/n} "Çok güzel."
languages.original_text: "I've never..." {n}Another stifled gasp. Then a laugh.{/n} "I have never seen such heights before in my life. No distance on the ship comes close to this. I feel like this emptiness might swallow me whole..." {n}Kibellah turns to you and smiles, this time sincerely.{/n} "It's beautiful."
